description: [``botocore``] CloudFormation IaC generator allows you to scan existing resources in your account and select resources to generate a template for a new or existing CloudFormation stack.
[``botocore``] Update elbv2 client to latest version
[``botocore``] Update page size limits for GetJobRuns and GetTriggers APIs.

[``botocore``] This release adds an optional Duration parameter to StateManager Associations. This allows customers to specify how long an apply-only-on-cron association execution should run. Once the specified Duration is out all the ongoing cancellable commands or automations are cancelled.
